page.title: 12MODERN HOUSING IN EGGINTON
page.content: My house is seven years old. We have lived in it for a year and a half. It is made of brick and tiles.It is heated by gas. It has got two floors. It is joined up by its garage to another garage. We have got two gardens. In the front garden there is a small patch with plants in. That is mine. Inside the house when you are in the door you see on the left the cloakroom. When you come out of there, face forward and there is another door. Go through that and the kitchen is through there.go forward and you will see swinging doors like a bar in the wild west and a sink and fridge and the microwave and breakfast bar. Go back the way you came and you will come to the brown door. Russell Arnold
